description:
Speaker: Eva Schreyer, Lisa Zäuner

Track:PyData
Data Science for Social Good Berlin (DSSG) brings together data scientist volunteers and nonprofit organisations that need support in tackling various data challenges. In this talk we will tell you how data science can be used for social good.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/PZVHP9
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Tackle the problems that really matter - leverage...
